trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentReaderAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentReaderAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentReaderAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
The collection of child elements.

Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentReaderAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentReaderAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentReaderAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value in the enumeration.
If patternInterface is , this method returns a pointer.
Otherwise, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets the current control-specific view.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentReaderAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IMultipleViewProvider> interface.
The value for the current view of the UI Automation element.
Returns a collection of control-specific view identifiers.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentReaderAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IMultipleViewProvider> interface.
A collection of values that identifies the views available for a UI Automation element.
Returns the name of a control-specific view.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentReaderAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IMultipleViewProvider> interface.
The ID of a view.
The name of a control-specific view.
Sets the current control-specific view.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentReaderAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IMultipleViewProvider> interface.
The ID of a view.
